newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuela bolivar closes flat at 470.00/471.00.
newsitem.headline: Venezuela bolivar closes flat at 470.00/471.00.

text.p: The Venezuelan bolivar closed flat at 470.00/471.00 per dollar in a balanced market that did not witness any Central Bank intervention, traders said.
There was "strong interbank dollar offer in the afternoon which brought the bolivar back to its closing price after morning demand saw it hit 470.50/471.50 per dollar," said one trader.
Morning demand was prompted by banks short on dollars that needed to square their books, traders said.
